thread.title: Man City kit man picks a bold way to entertain the players in Bournemouth
thread.title_full: Man City kit man picks a bold way to entertain the players in Bournemouth

author: Charlotte Duncker
title: Man City kit man picks a bold way to entertain the players in Bournemouth
text:
Sport Man City kit man picks a bold way to entertain the players in Bournemouth Manchester City went up to second in the league and closed the gap on league leaders Chelsea to eight points when they beat Bournemouth. Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Get Manchester City FC   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
As Man City prepared to take on Bournemouth in the Premier League the squad took a leisurely stroll along the beach front. 
The town may be famed for its seaside but it's not necessarily the top choice for holiday goers in February given the freezing temperatures. 
The cold didn't deter the team as they enjoyed a wander by the sea before their 2-0 win at the Vitality Stadium . 
One man who definitely wasn't phased was City's kit man Brandon Ashton, who decided to bring some entertainment to the stroll by taking a dip in the icy cold water. 
The brave (or slightly mad!) Ashton could be seen on the Willy Caballero Instagram accounts taking his clothes off and running down the beach in to the water. Nicolas Otamendi laughs as Brandon Ashton can be seen in the background running on the beach in his underwear. 
On the way he nearly gets attacked by a dog but makes it into the water - much to the delight of the squad stood on the side cheering him on. 
Gabriel Jesus posted a video of Brandon on his page with the caption: "This man is crazy." 
Nicolas Otamendi was seen laughing in his video as Brandon jumped around on the beach in his underwear. 
At least the water should be a bit warmer when City travel to Monaco, should he want to repeat his stunt. Read More
